nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

nws.name: Christmas Day
nws.shortForecast: Isolated Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: Isolated snow showers between 7am and 8am, then isolated rain and snow showers between 8am and noon. Mostly cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 31 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 12. Wind chill values as low as -2. Northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 24. Wind chill values as low as -2. Northwest wind 6 to 14 mph.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 8pm. Cloudy, with a low around 19. North wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 3pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 28. North wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 17. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 37. West wind around 7 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 10pm, then a chance of snow between 10pm and 11pm, then rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 29. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a high near 45. Southwest wind 8 to 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before midnight, then a slight chance of snow between midnight and 2am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 25. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 31. West wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 21. West wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 34. Southwest wind 9 to 13 mph.
